snippet: Gigi Jordan strongly denied prosecutors’ account of the murder of her son: that she had climbed on top of him and brutally forced a liquefied mix of drugs and alcohol down his throat with a syringe.
abstract: Gigi Jordan, woman accused of killing her son Jude Mirra in New York City's Peninsula Hotel, testifies that she tried to kill herself and Mirra through a lethal dose of drugs; denies prosecutors' assertion that she brutally forced mix of drugs and alcohol down his throat with a syringe; testimony comes about four weeks into Jordan's murder trial.
lead_paragraph: Gigi Jordan strongly denied prosecutors’ account of the murder of her son: that she had climbed on top of him and brutally forced a liquefied mix of drugs and alcohol down his throat with a syringe.

headline.main: In Testimony, Mother Who Killed Son, 8, Denies She Forcibly Drugged Him
headline.print_headline: In Testimony, Mother Who Killed Son, 8, Denies She Forcibly Drugged Him
